name: Black Dahlia
description: One of the lesser-known strains, this hybrid is a purported cross between Black Cherry Soda and Querkle. The flowers have purple-red coloration and are often sticky to the touch thanks to heavy trichome production. Black Dahlia leans toward its indica genetics and delivers strong body effects suitable for insomnia and pain relief.Â
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Sleepy, Euphoric, Tingly, Stress, Insomnia, Nausea, Inflammation, Pain, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Anxious
